articles.description: Between five and eight percent of the total US population has experienced infection with the new coronavirus, a top health body said Thursday as it warned pregnant women were at higher risk of getting severe COVID-19. The estimate for infections by the Center…

articles.title: Doctor warns of 'long-term Covid' after suffering symptoms for three months - Metro.co.uk
articles.description: Dr Jake Suett has called for a scientific study into whether there may be a potential ‘post-Covid syndrome’.
